name: motion
description: Build sophisticated React animations with Motion (formerly Framer Motion) - declarative animations, gestures (drag, hover, tap), scroll effects, spring physics, layout animations, and SVG manipulation. Optimize bundle size with LazyMotion (4.6 KB) or useAnimate mini (2.3 KB). Use when: adding drag-and-drop interactions, creating scroll-triggered animations, implementing modal dialogs with transitions, building carousels with momentum, animating page/route transitions, creating parallax hero sect
